events.name: BatchQualityChecked
events.description: Tracks when the quality of a batch has been verified.

events.name: SupplierAuditCompleted
events.description: Indicates that an audit of the supplier has been finished.

events.name: BatchTemperatureMonitored
events.description: Records the temperature at which the batch has been stored.

events.name: SupplyChainInterruptionDetected
events.description: Signals an interruption in the supply chain that might affect batch traceability.

events.name: SupplierPerformanceEvaluated
events.description: Tracks the evaluation results of the supplier's performance.

commands.name: CheckQuality
commands.description: Tracks when the quality of a batch has been verified.

commands.name: CompleteAudit
commands.description: Indicates that an audit of the supplier has been finished.

commands.name: LogTemperature
commands.description: Records the temperature at which the batch has been stored.

commands.name: AlertInterruption
commands.description: Signals an interruption in the supply chain that might affect batch traceability.

commands.name: EvaluatePerformance
commands.description: Tracks the evaluation results of the supplier's performance.

integrationPoints.name: QualityControlSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the quality control system to check and log batch quality.

integrationPoints.name: SupplyChainManagementSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration with supply chain management for real-time monitoring.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierAuditSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration to receive audit results directly from the auditing system.

integrationPoints.name: TemperatureMonitoringSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration to monitor and log temperatures of batches continuously.
